column2: >Priority: {=IF .Priority = 1 THEN ""Routine"" ELSE IF .Priority = 2 THEN ""ASAP"" ELSE IF .Priority = 3 THEN ""Stat"" ELSE """" }

column1: Patient name: {= IfKnownString(.LastName)}{=IF .MiddleName <> ? THEN "", "" + .MiddleName ELSE """"}{=IF .FirstName <> ? THEN "", "" + .FirstName ELSE """"}

column2: >Priority: {=IF .Priority = 1 THEN ""Routine"" ELSE IF .Priority = 2 THEN ""ASAP"" ELSE IF .Priority = 3 THEN ""Stat"" ELSE """" }

column1: Patient name: {= IfKnownString(.Patient.LastName)}{=IF .Patient.MiddleName <> ? THEN "", "" + .Patient.MiddleName ELSE """"}{=IF .Patient.FirstName <> ? THEN "", "" + .Patient.FirstName ELSE """"}
